completions.nl_description: Rotate all objects of color other than X by 90 degrees clockwise.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X and R, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, to swap their positions.
Move all objects to the nearest object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Rotate all objects by 90 degrees if they are neighbors of an object of color X.
Move all objects that are neighbors of objects of color X towards them.
Move all objects of color different than X one step clockwise.
Move all objects of color different than X to the row where the nearest object of color X exists, keeping their positions in the same column as before.
Rotate all objects one step clockwise if they are neighbors of an object of color X.
Move all objects of size 1 to the closest neighboring object of color X.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are in the same row or column.
Rotate all objects of color X by 90 degrees.
Move all objects of color R toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color B, F, W one step to the right.
Move all objects in the direction of the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it, without exceeding the grid.
Rotate all objects by 90 degrees clockwise.
Move all objects of a different color to the objects of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all red objects to the nearest adjacent empty spot.
Move all objects located in the same column as an object of color X one step upwards.
Rotate all objects 90 degrees clockwise.
Move all objects to the right if they are neighbors of an object of color X.
Move all objects of color different than R, toward the object of color R, if they are neighbors of it.
Shift each object one step towards the diagonally opposite position one by one, preserving the object positions which lead to swapping if neighbor is the same as 'this'.
completions.code:
(do
(rule
(vars (this other))
(filter (neighbor_of this other))
(apply
(move_node_max (direction_of other)))))

Move all objects of color different than X toward an object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.

Move all objects of color different than R toward the object of color R, if they are neighbors of it.
